abstract: Content: Reel 1: Heritage--Churchill's Island--V for Victory--13 Platoon--Train Busters--The Proudest Girl in the World--C'est l'aviron--Ordeal by Ice--Listen to the Prairies.--Reel 2: Guilty Men--The People Between--R.C.M.P. File 1365--Summer Is for Kids--Begone Dull Care--Safe Clothing--Look to the Forest--The Fight - Science Against Cancer.--Reel 3: Eye Witness No. 34: Winter Morning--From Father to Son--The Romance of Transportation--Land of the Long Day--Neighbours--The Bird Fancier--Shyness--Germany - Key to Europe.--Reel 4: Corral--The Grievance--Jolifou Inn--Monkey on the Back--Blinkity-Blank--World in a Marsh--Canadian Profile--The Sceptre and the Mace--City of Gold.--Reel 5: Les Brules--Introduction to Jet Engines--Voice of the People--Radiation--The Back-breaking Leaf--Mail Early--Universe
description: An anthology of scenes from memorable National Film Board films produced during the years from 1939 to 1960. Text on the screen identifies the film and its makers before each excerpt is shown, and the commentator notes the significant characteristics of each film's style and subject.
